  • 方法详细资料

    • getCurrentUsername

      public static String getCurrentUsername()
      Gets the username of the currently logged-in user.
      返回:
      The current username, or null if no user is logged in.

    • setCurrentUsername

      public static void setCurrentUsername(String username)
      Sets the username of the currently logged-in user.
      参数:
      username - The username to set.

    • getCurrentAccount

      public static User getCurrentAccount()
      Gets the account details of the currently logged-in user.
      返回:
      The current User account, or null if no user is logged in.

    • setCurrentAccount

      public static void setCurrentAccount(User account)
      Sets the account details of the currently logged-in user and updates the username.
      参数:
      account - The User account to set, or null to clear the session.

    • isAdmin

      public static boolean isAdmin()
      Checks if the current user is an administrator.
      返回:
      true if the current user has an admin account type, false otherwise

    • clearSession

      public static void clearSession()
      Clears the current user session, resetting the username and account to null.
